alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 1:46AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT RAIN AND WET SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...ALLEGANY...SOUTHERN ERIE...WYOMING...GENESEE...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of lake effect rain and wet snow. Minor slushy accumulations across higher terrain will produce difficult travel. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 144 AM EDT, a band of lake effect rain and wet snow was found across far northern Chautauqua County, northern Cattaraugus County, southern Erie, and southern Genesee counties. This band of lake effect will drift north through the wee hours of the morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Slushy snow accumulations across the higher terrain including the Boston Hills, Chautauqua Ridge, and ridges of Wyoming County. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 56 and 59. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming
